name: THE WUUUUUUUUUUUUU
description:
Vocal Multiplayer Game™.

Use your voice to raise the WUUUUUUUUUUUU !

Help the creatures to get to the right house.

Use the menu screen to adjust mic sensivity.


If you would like to use the game at a conference or workshop, please email at gian.dbeis@gmail.com !
